comment: I highly enjoyed this professor. There were a lot of activities in class instead of a lecture. She's very kind and understanding.

Very easy and manageable class. I took it this summer and every week we had a discussion post and/or project but nothing overbearing. The professor is very helpful and responds to emails really quick!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Group projects

comment: Another one of Kennesaw State Finest! She is an amazing lecturer. She makes her class extremely fun! I would take her every semester if I could. Class was a little work heavy but in the end she adjusted several of the due dates to ensure everyone had the opportunity to be successful.
